committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to proclaim April 6, 1975 as a day of observance of the 30th anniversary of the liberation of the survivors of the Holocaust.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim April 6, 1975, as a day of observance of the thirtieth anniversary of the liberation of the survivors of the holocaust.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to proclaim April 6, 1975 as a day of observance of the 30th anniversary of the liberation of the survivors of the Holocaust.
